T04sanssr_au:10623: satya-pratītya vimokṣanaye asmin nidriya jñāna-gatiṃ gata bhonti ||
T04sanssr_au:10627: rājya-dhana-ātma-priyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhi-nidānaṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10628: taṃ ca sat-kṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajña-viyūhāḥ ||
T04sanssr_au:10629: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10630: buddha sahasra an-eka a-cintyān paśyiṣu padma-vaneṣu niṣaṇṇān ||
T04sanssr_au:10632: buddha-bala-avi-prabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_au:10633: te * a-bhayaṃ-dada raśmi pramuñcī tāya + a-bhaya-ardita satva sa-spṛṣṭāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10635: ye a-bhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇi-badhāt tu nivārita bhonti |
T04sanssr_au:10637: yac-charaṇa-āgata bhītās tena bhayaṃ-dada raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_au:10638: sarva-sukha-āvaha osari raśmī tāya gilānaya ātura spṛṣṭāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10641: roga-vinodani mūla phal-oṣadha ratna rasāyana gandh-anulepān |
T04sanssr_au:10642: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā ||
T04sanssr_au:10643: buddha-nidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sa-codita āyu kṣayānte |
T04sanssr_au:10644: buddha anusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sa-buddha-kkṣetraṃ ||
T04sanssr_au:10645: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśita-prīta-karā jina-bimbān |
T04sanssr_au:10646: buddha-gatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇa-ante bhāsiya buddha-nidarśani labdhā ||
T04sanssr_au:10647: dharma-prabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā |
T04sanssr_au:10648: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharma-ratī rata te sada bhonti ||
T04sanssr_au:10650: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharma-prabhāvani labdhā ||
T04sanssr_au:10651: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddha-sutā paricodanatāyāṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10656: te * a-mṛtaṃ-dada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10657: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarva-guṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ ||
T04sanssr_au:10658: duṣkha an-eka upadrava-pūrṇaṃ bhāṣita saṃskṛta nityam a-kṣemaṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10659: śānti-nirodha-sukhaṃ sada kṣemaṃ bhāṣayatā a-mṛtaṃ-dada labdhā ||
T04sanssr_au:10660: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10663: śīlata agra samādhita agro prajñata agra mahā-muni-rājā |
T04sanssr_au:10666: ratna-viyūha ya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10669: ratna-visarga jine jina-stūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsna-janaṃ ratanebhiḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10670: ratna-pradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratna-viyūhāḥ ||
T04sanssr_au:10671: gandha-prabhāsa ya osari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10673: a-mānuṣa gandha mano-jñān buddha-guṇe niyutāni bhavanti ||
T04sanssr_au:10680: raśmi prasāda-karī yada muñcī pāṇi-tala-upama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10681: śodhayato ṛṣi āśrama-stūpān tena prasāda-karī prabha labdhā ||
T04sanssr_au:10682: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10685: bhūṣaṇa-vyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagna acela su-bhūṣaṇa bhontī |
T04sanssr_au:10687: raśmi rasa-agravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasa-agra labhantī |

T04sanssr_au:10689: artha-nidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratna-nidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10690: a-kṣaya-ratna-nidhiṃ tribhi ratnair dānata artha-nidarśani labdhā ||
T04sanssr_au:10691: cakṣu-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram |

T04sanssr_au:10695: ghrāṇa-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi a-ghrāyita-pūrva su-gandhān |

T04sanssr_au:10697: jihva-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdha-mano-jña-rutai stuti buddhān |
T04sanssr_au:10699: dur-ukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇa udīrita raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_au:10700: kāya-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriya-hīna su-indriya bhonti |
T04sanssr_au:10701: kāya-praṇāma jine jina-stūpe kurvata kāya-viśodhani labdhvā ||
T04sanssr_au:10702: citta-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sa-cita bhavanti |
T04sanssr_au:10705: rūpa-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpa-nara-indrān |
T04sanssr_au:10707: śabda-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabda a-śabdata śūnya vijānī |
T04sanssr_au:10708: pratyaya jāta prati-śruta-tulyaṃ śabda-prakāśana raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_au:10709: gandha-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva du-gandha su-gandha bhavantī |
T04sanssr_au:10710: gandha-vara-agra janair jina-stūpān snāpana-bodhi-druma prabha eṣā ||
T04sanssr_au:10711: te rasa-śodhani muñcati raśmīn sa-dviṣa nir-viṣa bhonti rasa-agrāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10713: sparśa-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī |
T04sanssr_au:10714: śakti-tri-śūla + asi [doubtful] tomara-varṣā mālya mṛdū paduma-utpala
T04sanssr_au:10716: duṣya an-eka mṛdū sukha-sparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10718: dharma-viśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān |
T04sanssr_au:10720: pratyaya jāta a-jāta sva-bhāvā dharma-śarīra a-jāta-śarīrāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10723: raśmi sukhā-pramukhā iti kṛtvā ekatu roma-mukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10726: te yatha ekata roma-mukhāto osari gaṅga-raja-upama raśmī |
T04sanssr_au:10729: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve |
T04sanssr_au:10730: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñāna-vikurvaṇa eṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ ||
T04sanssr_au:10731: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10733: śubha-upacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ ||
T04sanssr_au:10734: ye ca śubha-upacitāḥ kṛta-puṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10735: arthika chandika buddha-guṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ ||

T04sanssr_au:10744: evata raśmi mahā-puruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
T04sanssr_au:10747: yasy imu [doubtful] raśmi-prabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhi-mukti
T04sanssr_au:10749: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo na + aṅga na bheṣyi
T04sanssr_au:10755: te daśa-kṣetra-raja-upama anye padmam adhiṣṭhihi saṃparivāraṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10756: sarva parīvṛta buddha-sutebhī ye ca samādhy-a-samādhi-vihārī ||
T04sanssr_au:10757: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpa-dita buddha-guṇeṣu |
T04sanssr_au:10758: te parivāri ataṃ maha-padmaṃ sarva udikṣiṣu prāñjali-bhūtāḥ ||
T04sanssr_au:10759: te ca samāhita bāla-śarīre vyutthihi yauvana-vega-sthitebhyaḥ ||

T04sanssr_au:10767: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddha-vara-agra-śarīrā |
T04sanssr_au:10773: ekatu roma-mukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata roma-mukheṣu |
T04sanssr_au:10776: ekatu vāla-pathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vāla-pathebhyaḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10779: eka-rajasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarva-rajebhya a-śeṣam |
T04sanssr_au:10782: vṛkṣa-phaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmi-mukhebhi jinānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_au:10785: teja-pathasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi vāyu-patha-anusmṛti + imān |
T04sanssr_au:10786: vāyu-pathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmi-talānu mahā-ātmā ||
T04sanssr_au:10787: bhūmi-tale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu deva-vimānāt |
T04sanssr_au:10788: sarvi tu deva-balāna samāhita vyutthihi te gagana-anusmṛti + imān ||
T04sanssr_au:10789: eti samādhi vimokṣa a-cintyās teṣa a-cintya-guṇa-upacitānāṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10791: a-cintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarva-jinebhi na śakya kṣayītum ||
T04sanssr_au:10792: sarva-jinebhi ca bhāṣita ete karma-vipāku jagasya a-cintyo |
T04sanssr_au:10793: nāga-vikurvita buddha-vikurvā dhyāyina dhyāna a-cintya vikurvā ||
T04sanssr_au:10794: te ca vaśe sthita aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvaka eka bhavī-bahu bhontī |
T04sanssr_au:10795: bhūtva bahuḥ puna eka bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin ||
T04sanssr_au:10796: te hi mahā-karuṇāya vihīnā bodhi an-arthiku loka upekṣī |
T04sanssr_au:10798: kāya-vikurva a-cintyā kasya na darśayi loka hita-eṣī ||
T04sanssr_au:10799: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarva-diśi pratibhāsaṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10801: evam a-cintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarva-daśa-ddiśi te nara-vīrāḥ |
T04sanssr_au:10803: sāgara-deva rutāvati-nāmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā |

T04sanssr_au:10807: dhāraṇi-dharma-balaṃ vaśi-prāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sa-devaka-lokam ||
T04sanssr_au:10808: māya-karo yatha vidya-vidhi-jño darśayi rūpa vicitra an-antān |
T04sanssr_au:10810: māya-karo hi sa-rāgu sa-doṣo toṣayi māya-vikurvita lokaṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10811: dhyāna abhijña vimokṣa-su-śikṣita kasya na toṣayi carya-vidhi-jñaḥ ||
T04sanssr_au:10812: rāhu yatha-iṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade tala-bandhaṃ |
T04sanssr_au:10813: darśana sāgaru nābhi-pramāṇaṃ bhoti sumeru-tale sama śīrṣaḥ ||
T04sanssr_au:10814: so * api sa-rāgu sa-doṣa sa-moho rāhu nidarśayi īdṛśa ṛddhī |
T04sanssr_au:10815: māra-pramardana loka-pradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi an-antā ||
T04sanssr_au:10819: sarva-sura-indra-surāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata sva-āyum |eṣa

T04sanssr_au:10830: iti śikṣā-samuccaye ratna-traya-anusmṛti-nāma + aṣṭādaśaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ ||
T04sanssr_au:10838: tathā-gata-vigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarva-satvānāṃ

T04sanssr_au:10908: ete ca + anye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā

T04sanssr_au:10924: abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddha-kṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ

T04sanssr_au:10927: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarva-satvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīrya-pāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti ||
T04sanssr_au:10929: mahā-satvena na + uttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ
T04sanssr_au:10931: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ buddha-kṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me * an-uttarāṃ
T04sanssr_au:10932: samyak-saṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddha-kṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃ-rūpāṇi bubhukṣā-kāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti na

T04sanssr_au:10937: tad yathā + api nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādur-bhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate |
